sen.j: 九条道家等の公卿達が推す順徳天皇皇子の忠成王（仲恭天皇の異母弟）を退け、執権北条泰時は土御門天皇皇子の邦仁王（後嵯峨天皇）を即位させたが、この際に11日間の空位期間が発生した。
sen.e: The regent, Yosutoki HOJO let Prince Kunihito (the Emperor Gosaga), who was Emperor Tsuchimikado's Prince, to succeed to to the throne after getting rid of Emperor Juntoku's Prince, Prince Tadanari (Emperor Chukyo's half younger brother), who was recommended by the Court nobles of Michiie KUJO and others, and there was an interregnum of eleven days.

sen.j: 天皇空位は称徳天皇から光仁天皇に至る神護景雲4年（780年）の57日間以来462年ぶりで、以後は称光天皇から後花園天皇に至る正長元年（1428年）の7日間まで186年間起こらなかった（北朝を除く）。
sen.e: The interregnum period happened the first time in four hundred sixty two years, the last record of the interregnum period was fifty seven days from the era between Emperor Shotoku and Emperor Konin in Jingo Keiun 4 (708), after that it did not happen for a hundred eighty six years until Shocho1 (1428) when there was another interregnum period for seven days between the era of Emperor Shoko and Emperor Gohanazono. (Excluding Northern Dynasty)
